department.dept_long_name: Department of Earth and Planetary Sciences

course.title: Introduction to Ocean Circulation Physics
course.description: Introduction to the physical processes governing the large-scale circulation of the ocean. Emphasis on time-changing components, observational methods used, and a survey of basic methods of analysis and theory. Topics include sea level rise, oceanic heat transport changes, and smaller-scale physics.
course.prerequisites: Math or Applied Math 21a, Physics 11b, or permission of instructor. Basic knowledge of a high-level programming language such as Matlab or Mathematica.
